scene_description_enriched: A haloed figure, likely Saint John the Evangelist, is depicted seated outdoors, engaged in writing in a book. He wears a golden tunic and a rich red cloak, with his bare feet visible. Beside him, a large bird, possibly an eagle, stands attentively. The background features a dense forest of trees, transitioning to a landscape with water, rocky outcrops, and distant castles. The scene is framed by an illuminated border with floral motifs.
